gw.api.web.invoice

Class InvoicingOverrider

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.invoice.InvoicingOverrider

  • public final class InvoicingOverrider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages setting the invoicing overrides fields on an invoicing overridable It collects the information needed to set the overrides on an InvoicingOverridable The invoicingOverridable calls InvoicingOverridable.updateWith(InvoicingOverrider) and the overrides defined by this class are set on the overridable and the invoice items are moved to the correct payer and stream, if needed.

    • Method Detail

      • withOverridingPayerAccount

        public InvoicingOverrider withOverridingPayerAccount(@Nullable
                                            Account payerAccount)
        Set the overriding payer Account. Passing a null value will clear the overriding payer.
        Parameters:
        payerAccount - The overriding payer Account. Cannot be the owner Account. If null, will clear the overriding payer either an Account or a Producer.
        Returns:
        This instance of the InvoicingOverrider.

      • withOverridingInvoiceStream

        public InvoicingOverrider withOverridingInvoiceStream(@Nullable
                                             InvoiceStream invoiceStream)
        Passing a null InvoiceStream clears the overriding invoice stream.
        Parameters:
        invoiceStream - the overriding invoice stream.
        Returns:
        this

      • withReversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem

        public InvoicingOverrider withReversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem(ReversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem reversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem)
        Determine whether to reverse the payments when moving the invoice item to the new overriding payer or stream. Default is NO
        Parameters:
        reversePaymentsWhenMovingInvoiceItem - reverse any payments when the items are moved to overriding payer or stream
        Returns:
        this

      • withCreateInvoiceForToday

        public InvoicingOverrider withCreateInvoiceForToday(boolean createInvoiceForToday)
        Create a catch up invoice for today for past items.
        Parameters:
        createInvoiceForToday - if true, create a catch up invoice for today
        Returns:
        this

      • withRefactorAllInvoiceItems

        public InvoicingOverrider withRefactorAllInvoiceItems(boolean refactorAllInvoiceItems)
        Parameters:
        refactorAllInvoiceItems - if true move the billed and planned items if the payer account is changed if false move only the planned items By default only move the planned items
        Returns:
        this

      • withOverridesOf

        public static InvoicingOverrider withOverridesOf(InvoicingOverridable overridable)
        Parameters:
        overridable - the overridable to copy the overriding invoice stream and payer account of

        this

      • withShouldMoveInvoiceItems

        public InvoicingOverrider withShouldMoveInvoiceItems(boolean shouldMoveInvoiceItems)
        Parameters:
        shouldMoveInvoiceItems - whether to move the affected invoice items when setting the overrides. By default TRUE
        Returns:
        this
